entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lloydminster Airport 12:00 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Fog. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Fog dissipating. High minus 7.
